title: -connect
text:
This command connects the bot to the voice channel, and initializes the audioplayer.

Also, by calling this command, the bot will only respond to other voice commands if those commands are called from the same text channel as the connect command has been.

The bot auto detects force disconnects and movings to other channels.

Fails when:
  • The bot is already in a voice channel on the server
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • The bot has no permission to speak on the channel
  • The bot has no permission to connect to the channel
  • The voice channel is full

title: -disconnect
text:
This command disconnects the bot from the voice channel.

Fails when:
  • The bot is not on a voice channel
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • The user is not in the same voice channel as the bot
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in

title: -play [url/title]
text:
This command starts the requested music

Fails when:
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • The requested song is not in the correct format
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in
  • The user is not in the same voice channel as the bot

title: -skip
text:
This command stops the current song and starts the next if it's exists on the playlist

Fails when:
  • The bot is not connected to any voice channel
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • There is not any song currently playing
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in
  • The user is not in the same voice channel as the bot

title: -pause
text:
This command stops temporary (and in cases resumes) the current song

Fails when:
  • The bot is not connected to any voice channel
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • There is not any song currently playing
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in
  • The user is not in the same voice channel as the bot

title: -loop
text:
This command replays the current song, when it ends

Fails when:
  • The bot is not connected to any voice channel
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • There is not any song currently playing
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in
  • The user is not in the same voice channel as the bot

title: -nowplaying
text:
This command shows the current song

Fails when:
  • The bot is not connected to any voice channel
  • There is not any song currently playing
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in

title: -remove [index]
text:
This command remove song with selected index from the playlist

Fails when:
  • The bot is not connected to any voice channel
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • There is not any song currently playing
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in
  • The user is not in the same voice channel as the bot
  • Playlist index is out of range
  • If you try to remove currently playing song. Use skip instead of this

title: -nightcore
text:
This command set audioplayer to nightcore. It switches off daycore

Fails when:
  • The bot is not connected to any voice channel
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in
  • The user is not in the same voice channel as the bot

title: -daycore
text:
This command set audioplayer to daycore. It switches off nightcore

Fails when:
  • The bot is not connected to any voice channel
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in
  • The user is not in the same voice channel as the bot

title: -setspeed [speed]
text:
This command set audioplayer's speed

Fails when:
  • The bot is not connected to any voice channel
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in
  • The user is not in the same voice channel as the bot
  • Selected music speed must be in the range

title: -resetspeed
text:
This command reset audioplayer's speed

Fails when:
  • The bot is not connected to any voice channel
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in
  • The user is not in the same voice channel as the bot

title: -previous
text:
This command starts playing previous song

Fails when:
  • The bot is not connected to any voice channel
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • There are no songs that have been played before
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in
  • The user is not in the same voice channel as the bot

title: -lyrics [title]
text:
This command shows link of a lyrics by a title

Fails when:
  • The bot is not connected to any voice channel
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • There are no song found
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in
  • The user is not in the same voice channel as the bot

title: -shuffle
text:
This command plays songs random queue on the playlist. You can switch it off with this command too

Fails when:
  • The bot is not connected to any voice channel
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in
  • The user is not in the same voice channel as the bot

title: -queue
text:
This command shows the queue of the playlist

Fails when:
  • The bot is not connected to any voice channel
  • There is not any song currently playing
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in

title: -bassboost
text:
This command toggle bassboost of the audioplayer

Fails when:
  • The bot is not connected to any voice channel
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in
  • The user is not in the same voice channel as the bot

title: -clear
text:
This remove all of the songs from the playlist

Fails when:
  • The bot is not connected to any voice channel
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in
  • There is not any song currently playing
  • There is only one song in the playlist

title: -randomize
text:
This command randomize the order of the songs in the playlist. Instead of shuffle, it is irreversible

Fails when:
  • The bot is not connected to any voice channel
  • The user is not connected to any voice channel
  • The text channel is not the same text channel which the bot is working in
  • The user is not in the same voice channel as the bot
